description: Number of n-node rooted trees with nodes of 2 colors.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
R. J. Mathar, Topologically distinct sets of non-intersecting circles in the plane, arXiv:1603.00077 (2016), Table 3.
Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
Index entries for sequences related to trees
maple: spec := [N, {N=Prod(bead,Set(N)), bead=Union(R,B), R=Atom, B=Atom}]; [seq(combstruct[count](spec, size=n), n=1..40)];# second Maple program:with(numtheory):a:= proc(n) option remember; `if`(n<2, 2*n, (add(add(d*      a(d), d=divisors(j))*a(n-j), j=1..n-1))/(n-1))    end:seq(a(n), n=1..30);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, May 11 2014
mathematica: a[n_] := a[n] = If[n<2, 2*n, (Sum[Sum[d*a[d], {d, Divisors[j]}]*a[n-j], {j, 1, n-1}])/(n-1)]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 30}] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Feb 25 2015, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Jan 04 1999
